testsuite.name: | INVALID_EMAIL | Value is an invalid email address. |

testcase.name: Given I navigate to the Maple TA login page
testcase.classname: | INVALID_EMAIL | Value is an invalid email address. |

testcase.name: And I click the forgot your password link
testcase.classname: | INVALID_EMAIL | Value is an invalid email address. |

testcase.name: Then I am on the password reset page
testcase.classname: | INVALID_EMAIL | Value is an invalid email address. |

testcase.name: When I enter the invalid email address INVALID_EMAIL
testcase.classname: | INVALID_EMAIL | Value is an invalid email address. |

testcase.name: Then I see the password reset error message Value is an invalid email address.
testcase.classname: | INVALID_EMAIL | Value is an invalid email address. |

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: | INVALID_EMAIL | Value is an invalid email address. |

testsuite.system-out: Scenario Outline: User enters an invalid email address ?[90m# PasswordReset.feature:19?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter the invalid email address ?[0m?[32m?[1m?[0m ?[90m# PasswordResetSteps.enterInvalidEmailAddress(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the password reset error message ?[0m?[32m?[1mValue is required.?[0m ?[90m# PasswordResetSteps.assertEmailIsInvalid(String)?[0m
